title._content: Image taken from page 21 of 'Nine years in Nipon. Sketches of Japanese life and manners ... Second edition. [With illustrations.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Nine years in Nipon. Sketches of Japanese life and manners ... Second edition. [With illustrations.]" Author: FAULDS, Henry. Gardner Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001205243 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
